snippet: A couple whose home on Long Island was ruined by Hurricane Sandy get help to replace their stove, refrigerator and kitchen cabinets.
abstract: Anne Corso and her husband Nicholas, couple whose Island Park, LI, home was ruined by Hurricane Sandy, get help from UJA-Federal of New York to replace their boiler and electrical system; organization is supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: A couple whose home on Long Island was ruined by Hurricane Sandy get help to replace their stove, refrigerator and kitchen cabinets.

headline.print_headline: After Hurricane, Separation and Costly Home Repairs
headline.main: After Hurricane, Separation and Costly Home Repairs
